name: Dicebot and Card Guessing
description:
Poker cards, Zener cards, colours, and dice using a pseudo-random 'dice' function. 

Updated to add Zener cards (Sept 17, 2020).
Planned updates include adding some more kinds of cards, and getting sets of dice to roll all at once.

--

The dice and poker cards, and (for now) all the sound effects, are from the:

Boardgame pack v2 by Kenney Vleugels (www.kenney.nl)
